You'll help me be strong, won't you kitten?$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 3/emote Jas 20/pause 500/emote MrGinger 32/pause 500/viewport -100 -100/playMusic AbigailFlute/warp MrGinger -1000 -1000/warp farmer -1000 -1000/warp Jas -1000 -1000/warp GingerCute -100 -100/animate GingerCute false true 250 0 1 3 12 13 14 15/emote GingerCute 24/speak MrGinger "The witch didn't leave me there in the cave. No, she took me away and dumped me in the countryside, far from home.$2#$b#I could barely remember who I was, who I had been.$2#$b#There was one memory that I clung to, however. Her.#$b#Mona. My beloved.$2#$b#I learned to hunt, and to follow the tingle in my whiskers..."/changeLocation Town/viewport -100 -100/warp MarnShane 47 88/stopAnimation GingerCute/warp GingerCute 45 91/showFrame GingerCute 12/speak MrGinger "...but when I finally found my way home, I was too late.$2"/playMusic desolate/viewport 45 89 true/pause 2500/animate MarnShane false false 450 0 1 2/showFrame MarnShane 2/pause 2500/animate GingerCute false false 350 16 17 18 19 19 19/pause 2000/showFrame GingerCute 19/fade/viewport -100 -100/pause 1000/warp MarnShane -1000 -1000/speak MrGinger "But within the darkness, there was one bright spark.#$b#Her daughter.#$b#My Jas."/stopMusic/warp MarnCute 49 33 2 false/showFrame MarnCute 0/warp JasCute 50 33/warp GingerCute 50 37/showFrame JasCute 0/pause 500/viewport -100 -100/fade/viewport 50 34 true/pause 1000/animate GingerCute false false 250 12 13 14 15/pause 1000/showFrame JasCute 1/emote JasCute 20/pause 500/textAboveHead JasCute "Kitty!"/pause 500/showFrame GingerCute 0/pause 500/faceDirection GingerCute 0/pause 500/animate JasCute false false 250 1 2 3/emote GingerCute 16/pause 500/move GingerCute 0 -3 2/showFrame Jas 2/showFrame GingerCute 18/pause 500/faceDirection MarnCute 1/pause 250/emote GingerCute 20/emote MarnCute 32/pause 1000/viewport -100 -100/speak MrGinger "And from that day on, you stole my heart, Jas.#$b#I might not have been able to be your father, but I could be your friend.#$b#And help you grow and flourish, watch you become bold and smart, and so very kind too. Your mother would've been so proud, kitten.$2"/pause 500/changeLocation AnimalShop/warp MrGinger 4 6/warp Jas 5 5/warp farmer 6 6/viewport 11 11/pause 500/emote MrGinger 20/emote Jas 20/pause 1500/faceDirection Jas 1/speak Jas "See farmer @! We've got to break the curse. You'll help us right?"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/switchEvent BreakCurse
Entries.BreakCurse: pause 500/speak Jas "I've been reading up heaps and heaps about enchantments, and the stories all say love breaks spells!#$b#But my love isn't enough...$s#$b#I know you love Mr Ginger almost as much as I do."/pause 500/emote farmer 28/speak Jas "Oh, I don't mean the kissy-kissy kind of love!$1#$b#I mean, like the bestest and bestest of friends, who'd do anything for each other: like Vinny and me."/playSound cat/pause 500/speak Jas "Yes, really! We would!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Jas "How do we use our love to break the enchantment? I don't know...$3"/pause 500/speak MrGinger "Nor do I...$2#$b#But Ras'll help us.$4"/pause 500/speak Jas "You mean that weird man in the tower? Aunt Marnie said to stay away from him... he scares me!$3#$b#But you'll talk to him, won't you farmer @?"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/Message "I wonder if anyone else remembers Tristan?"/pause 1000/end

Cos Mom loved them!"/pause 500/faceDirection MrGinger 3/animate farmer true false 250 31 32 33/removeSprite 29 22/playSound dropItemInWater/jump MrGinger/pause 500/glow 1 80 80 true/move Jas 0 2 3/move Jas -1 0 3/textAboveHead Jas "Wow!"/pause 500/shake MrGinger 340/pause 500/animate farmer true true 500 30/addObject 29 22 795 1/speak MrGinger "A Void Salmon... for her. If I don't come out... well, it's been nice knowing you, @.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection MrGinger 2 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/speak MrGinger "Whether I come out of there on two legs or four... I love you kitten."/emote Jas 20/pause 500/faceDirection MrGinger 3/jump MrGinger 7/screenFlash 1 1/playSound healSound/fade/viewport -100 -100/move MrGinger -2 0 2/faceDirection Jas 3/warp MrGinger -1000 -1000/addTemporaryActor Tristan 16 32 25 25 1 true/swimming Tristan/faceDirection farmer 3/viewport 24 26/pause 500/textAboveHead Jas "It worked!"/emote farmer 16 true/pause 500/faceDirection Tristan 1/speak Tristan "Um... hi. Err, I don't suppose anyone thought to bring a towel, did they?"/pause 1500/playSound wand/warp Wizard 27 22/showFrame Tristan 8/faceDirection Jas 0 true/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Wizard "Hello Tristan, it's good to see you again."/move farmer 0 -2 3/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "I shall take it from here, @. You should accompany Miss Jasmine home. She's up past her bedtime."/pause 500/jump Jas 5/speed Jas 3/move Jas 0 -2 0/emote Jas 12/speak Jas "That's not fair! He's MY Dad!$2#$b#He should come home with me!$4"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "There are few things in life that are fair, child. I'm happy to be back again and to finally meet you as me.#$b#But it's really late, and I'm sure Aunt Marnie's had enough surprises tonight already.$1#$b# I'll be okay. Ras and I have a lot to catch up on. I'll come and see you in the morning, okay?$4"/pause 500/textAboveHead Jas "Promise?"/pause 1500/textAboveHead Tristan "Promise"/pause 1500/emote Jas 40/pause 1500/textAboveHead Jas "Okay"/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 0/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Jas "Can you please take me home, farmer @?"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/emote Tristan 20/pause 1000/fade/viewport -100 -100/stopSwimming Tristan/end
